value.title: StarCraft 2: The Zerg Priority List! (Guide)
value.excerpt: In StarCraft 2 it is generally known that macro is more important than micro. However, this concept makes sense to those that have been playing a lot but if you haven't played in a while or if you're new to the game this concept is confusing.
